attributes.action: Make Monday after the Final a public bank holiday
attributes.additional_details: It’s history in the making the first major final in most of our life times to reward the people of this country that’s went through hardship for the last 12 month or so a public holiday to celebrate “it’s coming home”
attributes.background: Boris to make the Monday after the final when we win a public bank holiday only England

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Bank Holiday Monday if England get to the finals of the Euro’s 2020
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590584
